snippet: The jockeys Chris Antley, Victor Espinoza and Craig Perret are among the 10 finalists for election to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
abstract: Kentucky Derby-winning jockeys Chris Antley, Victor Espinoza and Craig Perret are among 10 finalists for election to National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: The jockeys Chris Antley, Victor Espinoza and Craig Perret are among the 10 finalists for election to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.

headline.main: 10 Are Finalists for Horse Racing Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: 10 Are Finalists for Hall of Fame
